text: @GOPLeader Statues?!? Americans are dying from COVID19 and Russian bounty! The economy is in shambles with millions unemployed and all this administration said it to find something else! What something else is there? You and the rest of the @GOP are #TraitorsSupportTraitorTrump are useless
